    state
    # volume

  }
}

graphql.query:
query metrics($averagingWindowSeconds: Int, $endDate: DateTime, $environmentId: String, $groupBy: [MetricTag]!, $includeDeleted: Boolean, $measurements: [MetricMeasurement!]!, $pluginId: String, $projectId: String, $sampleRateSeconds: Int, $serviceId: String, $startDate: DateTime!, $teamId: String, $userId: String, $volumeId: String) {
  metrics(
    averagingWindowSeconds: $averagingWindowSeconds
    endDate: $endDate
    environmentId: $environmentId
    groupBy: $groupBy
    includeDeleted: $includeDeleted
    measurements: $measurements
    pluginId: $pluginId
    projectId: $projectId
    sampleRateSeconds: $sampleRateSeconds
    serviceId: $serviceId
    startDate: $startDate
    teamId: $teamId
    userId: $userId
    volumeId: $volumeId
  ) {
    __typename
    measurement # The measurement of the metric.
    # tags # The tags that were used to group the metric. Only the tags that were used to by will be present.
    # values # The samples of the metric.
  }
}
graphql.variables:
{
	"averagingWindowSeconds": null,
	"endDate": null,
	"environmentId": null,
	"groupBy": [null],
	"includeDeleted": null,
	"measurements": [null],
	"pluginId": null,
	"projectId": null,
	"sampleRateSeconds": null,
	"serviceId": null,
	"startDate": null,
	"teamId": null,
	"userId": null,
	"volumeId": null
}

graphql.query:
query pluginLogs($endDate: DateTime, $environmentId: String!, $filter: String, $limit: Int, $pluginId: String!, $startDate: DateTime) {
  pluginLogs(
    endDate: $endDate
    environmentId: $environmentId
    filter: $filter
    limit: $limit
    pluginId: $pluginId
    startDate: $startDate
  ) {
    __typename
    # attributes # The attributes that were parsed from a structured log
    message # The contents of the log message
    severity # The severity of the log message (eg. err)
    # tags # The tags that were associated with the log
    timestamp # The timestamp of the log message in format RFC3339 (nano)
  }
}
graphql.variables:
{
	"endDate": null,
	"environmentId": null,
	"filter": null,
	"limit": null,
	"pluginId": null,
	"startDate": null
}

graphql.query:
query usage($endDate: DateTime, $groupBy: [MetricTag]!, $includeDeleted: Boolean, $measurements: [MetricMeasurement!]!, $projectId: String, $startDate: DateTime, $teamId: String, $userId: String) {
  usage(
    endDate: $endDate
    groupBy: $groupBy
    includeDeleted: $includeDeleted
    measurements: $measurements
    projectId: $projectId
    startDate: $startDate
    teamId: $teamId
    userId: $userId
  ) {
    __typename
    measurement # The measurement that was aggregated.
    # tags # The tags that were used to group the metric. Only the tags that were used in the `groupBy` will be present.
    value # The aggregated value.
  }
}

request.description: Generate a template for a project

graphql.query:
mutation templatePublish($id: String!, $input: TemplatePublishInput!) {
  templatePublish(id: $id, input: $input) {
    __typename
    activeProjects
    code
    config
    createdAt
    # creator
    demoProjectId
    id
    isApproved
    metadata
    projects
    # services
    # similarTemplates
    status
    teamId
    totalPayout
    userId
  }
}
